Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound

Description:

The Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton and Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: All Inbound buses at the University Downtown Center return to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:25 A.M. to 11:25 P.M. (Fridays) or 10:55 P.M. (Monday-Thursdays)


Weekends:
10:25 A.M. to 11:35 P.M. (Saturdays) or 12:25 A.M. (Sundays)

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

① Leaves the University Downtown Center

② Leroy & Murray Streets

③ Riverside Dr & Columbus Pl

④ Arrives at the University Union


AA= Does NOT service Academic A Mon, Wed, and Fri.

AA= Does NOT service Academic A Tues and Thurs.

AA= Does NOT service Academic A any weekday.
